name: rblcheck
short_description:
rblcheck has moved to github: https://github.com/logic/rblcheck

Since SourceForge doesn't provide a useful "delete this project" option, this will have to do.

It's a shame SourceForge has become such a pox on the open source community, after having done so much good in their earlier days.

http://arstechnica.com/information-technology/2015/05/sourceforge-grabs-gimp-for-windows-account-wraps-installer-in-bundle-pushing-adware/
http://www.ghacks.net/2013/07/17/sourceforges-new-installer-bundles-program-downloads-with-adware/
